title: Understanding the Graph
text: Look at the g(x) values as the x-values approach $$-1$$ from either side to determine the limit of the function.

title: The Approaching Limit
text: What number do the g(x) values approach as the x-values approach -1?

title: Determining $$/lim{x$$ ,-1, g(x)}
text: Despite the fact that $$g(-1)$$ $$=$$ $$4$$, as the x-values approach $$-1$$ from either side, the g(x) values approach $$3$$. Therefore, $$lim_x$$ → $$-1$$ g(x) $$=$$ $$3$$. Note that we can determine this limit without even knowing the algebraic expression of the function.
